body: {"query": "mutation CreatePet($petProfileData: PetInput!) { create_pet_profile(petProfileData: $petProfileData) { pet { petId name } } }","variables": { "petProfileData": { "petId": "1", "organizationName": "Animal Shelter", "applicantName": "John Doe", "contactEmail": "john.doe@example.com", "contactPhone": "1234567890", "name": "Fluffy", "category": "Cat", "age": 2, "gender": "Female", "color": "White", "size": "Small", "location": "New York", "vaccination": "Yes", "availability": "Available", "image": "http://example.com/fluffy.jpg", "description": "A lovely white cat." } } }
